text: @DWUhlfelderLaw @marcorubio so you are ok with your constituents dying?  You are ok with your constituents getting sick and having medical problems due to COVID19 for the rest of their lives? Why can’t you promote the scientific evidence of the medical community and at least WEAR A MASK!
